quotes.quote: Romanticism is not just a mode; it literally eats into every life. Women will never get rid of just waiting for the right man.
The essence of romantic love is that wonderful beginning, after which sadness and impossibility may become the rule.
If there is moonlight outside, don't stay inside! If there is candle inside, don't stay outside! Moments of romanticism are too valuable to be missed!
Classicism is health, romanticism is disease.
Romanticism is beauty without bounds-the beautiful infinite.
Nothing spoils romance so much as a sense of humor in the woman.
Worrisome. It's romanticism, and it's dangerous to have children and students on the street.
It's all romanticism, nonsense, rottenness, art.
Romanticism has never been properly judged. Who was there to judge it? The critics!
Romanticism implies nostalgia for damaged goods.
Boredom is simply romanticism with a morning-after thirst.
Romanticism was more than merely an alternative to a sterile classicism; romanticism made possible, especially in art, a great expansion of the human consciousness.
Romanticism is precisely situated neither in choice of subject, nor exact truth, but in the way of feeling.
In Romanticism, the main determinant is the mood, the atmosphere. And in that regard, you could also describe Schubert as a Romantic.
At the heart of all romanticism is suffering.
Romanticism is a cultural tool of male power to keep women from knowing their conditions.
Only the really young are fearless, have the optimism, the romanticism to take unimaginable risks.
To say the word Romanticism is to say modern art - that is, intimacy, spirituality, color, aspiration towards the infinite, expressed by every means available to the arts.
Romanticism is the abuse of adjectives.
Romanticism is the mother of kitsch and that there are moments when the child becomes so like its mother that one cannot differentiate between them.
He must have a truly romantic nature, for he weeps when there is nothing at all to weep about.
For me, Romanticism is the most recent and the most current expression of beauty.
